headline: Nucor: Mixed Q1 But Encouraging Guidance For Growth In Q2
summary: Nucor's strong balance sheet, diversification, and expansion projects position it as a solid long-term investment despite economic & market risks. See more on NUE.

headline: Nucor (NUE) Q1 Earnings: How Key Metrics Compare to Wall Street Estimates
summary: The headline numbers for Nucor (NUE) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended March 2025, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: Nucor (NUE) Q1 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
summary: Nucor (NUE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 13.24% and 8.52%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: US steelmaker Nucor tops quarterly estimates on higher spot prices
summary: U.S. steelmaker Nucor Corp beat analysts' estimates for first-quarter revenue and profit on Monday, helped by strength in its mills segment operations. The segment, which produces steel sheets, plates, bars and structural steel, reported a 10% rise in total shipments to 6.4 million tonnes. Steelmakers benefited from a rise in spot prices of hot-rolled coil (HRC), the most actively traded form of finished steel, following an uptick in domestic demand after President Donald Trump raised tariffs for steel and aluminum imports.

headline: NXP Semiconductors CEO, F5 guidance, Nucor Q1 results
summary: Asking for a Trend host Josh Lipton covers the several stocks trending on the Yahoo Finance platform in after-hours trading, including NXP Semiconductor (NXPI) after CEO Kurt Sievers announces his plans to retire, F5's (FFIV) earnings and guidance beat, and Nucor's (NUE) first quarter earnings figures. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend here.

headline: Nucor: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) — Nucor Corp. NUE) on Monday reported first-quarter profit of $156 million. On a per-share basis, the Charlotte, North Carolina-based company said it had profit of 67 cents.

headline: Nucor Reports Results for the First Quarter of 2025
summary: Nucor Corporation (NYSE: NUE) today announced consolidated net earnings attributable to Nucor stockholders of $156 million, or $0.67 per diluted share, for the first quarter of 2025. Excluding certain one-time charges taken during the quarter, Nucor's first quarter of 2025 adjusted net earnings attributable to Nucor stockholders was $179 million, or $0.77 per diluted share. By comparison, Nucor reported consolidated net earnings attributable to Nucor stockholders of $287 million, or $1.22 per di
